original_text: And the porch that was in the front of the house, the length of it was according to the breadth of the house, twenty cubits, and the height was an hundred and twenty: and he overlaid it within with pure gold.
korean_text: 그 성전 앞에 있는 낭실의 길이가 성전의 너비와 같이 이십 규빗이요 높이가 백이십 규빗이니 안에는 순금으로 입혔으며

sentences.original_text: And the porch that was in the front of the house
length of it was according to the breadth of the house
and the height was an hundred and twenty
and he overlaid it within with pure gold
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 그것을 안쪽에 순수한 금으로 입혔다
